bike.description: C-10 SuperLite Monocoque High Modulus carbon with 3K, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-10 SuperLite High Modulus carbon stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger
